shows.title: Strange Investigations / Sasquatch & Alien Abductions
shows.first_half: Paranormal investigator Tobias Wayland discussed a range of unusual subjects, including winged humanoids, anomalous aerial phenomena, and ghosts. Followed by researcher Carter Buschardt on Sasquatch encounters and alien abductions.

shows.title: The Joy of Connection / Exploring Parallel Universes
shows.first_half: First Half: Award-winning author Daniel Coyle will share his research on why the general population feels more disconnected, automated, and isolated than ever. He'll detail how, after five years of studying this specific topic, he has reached the conclusion that flourishing isn't an individual pursuit—it's a collective one.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Dr. Bruce Goldberg will explain the concept of "paragression" into parallel lives along with how we can all switch into a parallel universe. He'll also tackle time travel, time machines, and the fifth dimension.

shows.title: Natural Health Remedies / Time Slip Experiences
shows.first_half: First Half: Pharmacist Ben Fuchs will discuss the many ways we can incorporate natural remedies alongside modern medicine to help with ailments and health issues. He believes natural supplements are essential when it comes to everyday wellness.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Ann Winsper will explain the phenomenon of time slips, events where people describe journeying back in time to a previous era. She'll share how these alleged events are generally, although not always, short-lived and often include interactions with others in the past.

shows.title: The Nancy Guthrie Case / Contacting the Beyond
shows.first_half: First Half: Podcaster Joel Waldman will discuss all aspects of the ongoing abduction case of 84-year-old Nancy Guthrie. He'll go over all aspects of the case and examine evidence from authorities, including the black gloves that are currently under DNA analysis. Waldman is the co-host of the true-crime podcast Surviving the Survivor.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author Karen A. Dahlman will discuss modern spirit communication, consciousness discernment, and how the Ouija board functions as an interface between human awareness and external, non-physical intelligence.

shows.title: Heightened Human Senses / UFO Crash Update
shows.first_half: First Half: Author, tech founder, and photographer Maureen Seaberg will discuss how the human sensory system is far stronger than anyone realizes. She'll also explain how this system is very specific to Earth and doesn't work well off-world. Seaberg will specifically detail how our senses interact within our body and how they dictate the way we think, feel, and react to different situations.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Writer and archaeologist Mark Olly will outline the recent analysis of UFO crash debris found scattered across four fields outside a sleepy Welsh village in January 1983.

shows.title: Preventing Spiritual Attacks / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Bill Bean, known as the Spiritual Warrior, will share his personal story and talk about his career as an exorcist and minister. He'll explain the 15 warning signs of a possible spiritual attack and will pass along information on how to prevent it from happening. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half—give George a call and discuss whatever's on your mind!
